item.title: Epherema
item.description: Lists Inspiration: the moon, the body, bodies of water, holes, desire, yearning, the strange, supernatural, body horror, chinese folklore, Socialism with Chinese Characteristics, the politics of revolution & solidarity, becoming & undoing, eggs, pills, computers, computer-generated-poetry, simulations Books I like: The Jarkta Method by Vincent Bevins: a must-read for any socialist living in the imperial core to understand the extent of Washington's anti-communist crusade in the 1970s, and its effects today Hard Damage by Aria Arber: beautiful unapologetically political poetry!

item.title: Writing
item.description: 2021 "excavation" in Biological Creatures (online, forthcoming) 2020 Felicia Farr Lemmon Poetry Prize sponsored by the Academy of American Poets: Honorable Mention "Senesence" and "Stability is Just a Dulling" in Forum Magazine (print)
